# digest-tracker

> Track topics, fetch news from media and blog sources, and generate digests with Turso SQLite storage. A CLI tool for creating daily, weekly, or monthly digests that can be published to blogs.

digest-tracker is a CLI tool for topic tracking and digest generation. It supports:
- Multiple source types: RSS feeds, web scraping, YouTube
- Incremental fetching - only retrieves new content since last run
- Turso SQLite cloud storage with local SQLite fallback
- Daily, weekly, and monthly digest generation
- Blog publishing to local, Hugo, Jekyll, and WordPress
- WhatsApp-formatted digest output

## Documentation

- [digest-tracker Documentation](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/): Complete documentation including quick start, configuration, and all CLI commands
- [Quick Start Guide](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#quick-start): Get started with topic tracking in 5 minutes
- [CLI Commands Reference](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#cli-commands): Complete reference for all digest commands
- [Blog Publishing](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#blog-publishing): Configure and publish digests to various blog platforms
- [Turso Setup](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#turso-setup): Guide for setting up Turso cloud SQLite database

## Installation

- [PyPI Package](https://pypi.org/project/digest-tracker/): Install with `pip install digest-tracker`
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/CCAgentOrg/digest-tracker): Source code, issues, and contributions

## Configuration

- [Configuration File](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#configuration): Setting up config.yml for Turso, topics, and sources
- [Environment Variables](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#environment-variables): TURSO_DATABASE_URL and TURSO_AUTH_TOKEN

## Source Types

- [RSS Feeds](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#rss-feeds): Fetching from RSS feeds with incremental updates
- [Web Scraping](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#web-scraping): Extracting articles from web pages
- [YouTube](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#youtube): Fetching videos from channels and search queries

## Blog Types

- [Local Blogs](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#local-blogs): Publishing to local directories
- [Hugo Blogs](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#hugo-blogs): Publishing to Hugo sites with frontmatter
- [Jekyll Blogs](https://ccagentorg.github.io/digest-tracker/#jekyll-blogs): Publishing to Jekyll sites with frontmatter

## Optional

- [nanobot-skills digest-tracker](https://github.com/CCAgentOrg/nanobot-skills/tree/main/digest-tracker): nanobot skill wrapper for digest-tracker CLI
- [CCAgentOrg](https://github.com/CCAgentOrg): Organization page for CCAgentOrg projects
